summary: Build an AMS Digital-style marketing website centered on client success stories, recreating key site pages and services content by extracting/carrying over content from the existing AMS Digital URLs (especially the portfolio).
architectural_notes: Content source is the existing AMS Digital website pages provided by the user; portfolio page is the primary source for success stories/case studies.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Modern agency hero illustration with abstract shapes and subtle success/metrics motifs (ams-hero-visual.dim_1600x900.png)
- Set of 6–9 case study thumbnail images in a consistent style (ams-case-thumb-set.dim_1200x800.png)
- Minimal icon set for services in a consistent outline style (ams-services-icons-sprite.dim_1024x1024.png)

existing_features.title: Implement a multi-page site structure that mirrors the provided AMS Digital URLs, using client-side routing so each of these paths renders a dedicated page: / (Home), /about, /portfolio, /blogs, /contact, /customer-reviews, /cookie-policy, /privacy-policy, /amsdigital-profile, /services, and one route per service detail page for every URL provided in the request (e.g., /services/logo-and-branding-design, /services/graphic-design, ... /services/pay-per-click).

Refocus the website narrative so the Home page and global messaging primarily highlight client success: make case studies/success stories the central content (above or alongside service promotion), and ensure primary CTAs route users toward viewing case studies and requesting a consultation.

Create a Portfolio/Case Studies page whose content is extracted and adapted from https://www.amsdigital.in/portfolio.php, including (at minimum) a list/grid of case studies and a case-study detail view (either a dedicated route per case study or an in-page detail pattern) featuring problem/approach/outcome and supporting visuals.

Create a Services landing page (/services) and individual service detail pages for all provided service URLs; each service detail page must include: service overview, key deliverables, process/approach, typical outcomes, and a CTA to Contact.

Create dedicated pages for About (/about), Blogs (/blogs), Contact (/contact), Customer Reviews (/customer-reviews), and AMS Digital Profile (/amsdigital-profile), with English user-facing copy adapted from the corresponding provided AMS Digital URLs.
Create dedicated legal/policy pages for /privacy-policy and /cookie-policy (not just on-page anchors), and ensure the footer links navigate to these routes.

Update the global header and footer navigation so it supports the new multi-page structure: include links to Home, About, Services, Portfolio, Blogs, Customer Reviews, and Contact; ensure mobile navigation supports the same destinations.

Centralize all extracted/adapted site content (case studies, services, blog posts, reviews) into maintainable data modules (e.g., typed TS objects), and render pages from this data rather than hard-coding large text blocks inside components.

Apply a cohesive, distinct visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) suitable for a modern digital agency and consistent across all new pages; avoid a blue/purple-dominant palette.
Add and render the required generated images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated, and use them on the Home and Portfolio pages (hero visual and case-study thumbnails).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create website structure and core pages (Home, About, Portfolio, Blogs, Contact, Reviews, Profile) based on provided AMS Digital URLs
Make the site narrative revolve around client success stories and services provided, emphasizing case studies/testimonials
Extract and adapt content from https://www.amsdigital.in/portfolio.php for the new website’s portfolio/case studies section
Create Services landing page and individual service detail pages matching the provided services URLs list
Include required policy/legal pages (Cookie Policy, Privacy Policy) as part of the site

projectName: Create AMS Digital multi-page marketing site centered on client success stories and services (content adapted from provided AMS Digital URLs)
